==Thoughts==
{{All Schemes to Know Explanation|name=Dilawar}}
{{Dialogue start}}
:{{A|VO Dilawar All Schemes to Know 01.ogg}} '''Dilawar:''' (Simple-minded people are better off not doing business.)
{{Dialogue end}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Dilawar:''' If you're here to make a trade, you have to be prepared to be penniless, and not just dream of overnight riches.
:{{DIcon}} It's that intense?
::'''Dilawar:''' Hehe, this is the [[Wikala Funduq]], the port's trade hub.
::'''Dilawar:''' The total amount of wealth is fixed. When some people make money, some people will lose it.
::'''Dilawar:''' Anyone who's able to make money here must have tricks up their sleeves.
::'''Dilawar:''' If you approach it too casually... Well, how about you try your luck at the [[Kalimi Exchange]] downtown?
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Dilawar:''' Hehe, it's not that easy to turn a profit.
{{Dialogue end}}
